attributes.action: Sack the Government and all current MP’s
attributes.additional_details: Just look at the current state of affairs.
attributes.background:
There was a referendum vote to stay in the EU or LEAVE.
It was voted ‘LEAVE’,
At this current time all political parties are making a mess of the UK with delivering LEAVE.

I would like to sack all MP’s that are paid for by the public purse,
For failing the UK.

rejection.details:
How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.

You might like to sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
